verses.roman:
āste-vyaste sabe dhari' prabhure uṭhāila
naukāra upare prabhu nācite lāgila

synonyms: āste-vyaste—with great haste; sabe—all of them; dhari'-catching; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; uṭhāila—raised; naukāra—of the boat; upare—on top; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nācite lāgila—began to dance.
translation: They all hastily grabbed Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and pulled Him out of the water. Once on the boat's platform, the Lord began to dance.
